ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Project_Manager_Score__c!=0, Project_Manager_Score__c!=1, Project_Manager_Score__c!=2, Project_Manager_Score__c!=3, Project_Manager_Score__c!=4, Project_Manager_Score__c!=5, Project_Manager_Score__c!=6, Project_Manager_Score__c!=7, Project_Manager_Score__c!=8, Project_Manager_Score__c!=9, Project_Manager_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
